name: STUDY! Hina
description:
STUDY! Hina is a 3D collect-a-thon and platformer game made in Unity for my Games Development module.

It's a small tiny game with incredible dialogues written in the middle of the night and a story that I believe everyone can relate to.

STUDY! Hina follows the story of Hina, a student who forgot to study for their exams because she forgot they existed. She has to collect books and "study" last minute.

Enjoy!
